title: ✦CHARMING 3bed Apt in Central Sq avail. 9/1 (1/2 Broker Fee)
posting_body: Newly renovated, beautiful 3 bedroom apartment in a multi-family house.
Located within minutes to public transportation, Shaws, parks, and a wide variety of shops and restaurants.
Unit features a renovated bathroom, updated kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances, and dishwasher/disposal.
Spacious living area with lots of natural light.
On-street parking with a residential permit.
Please call/email Chris to schedule a showing!

Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.
Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.
All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.
Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.
Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.
